verses.verse: And he said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Come up <WH5927> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, thou <WH175>, and Aaron, Nadab <WH5070>, and Abihu <WH30>, and seventy <WH7657> of the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>; and worship <WH7812> ye afar off <WH7350>:
and Moses <WH4872> alone shall come near <WH5066> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; but they shall not come near <WH5066>; neither shall the people <WH5971> go up with him <WH5927>.

And Moses <WH4872> came <WH935> and told <WH5608> the people <WH5971> all the words <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and all the ordinances <WH4941>: and all the people <WH5971> answered <WH6030> with one <WH259> voice <WH6963>, and said <WH559>, All the words <WH1697> which Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH559> will we do <WH6213>.

And Moses <WH4872> wrote <WH3789> all the words <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and rose up early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242>, and builded <WH1129> an altar <WH4196> under the mount <WH2022>, and twelve pillars <WH4676>, according to the twelve <WH8147> tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478>.

And he sent <WH7971> young men <WH5288> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, who offered <WH5927> burnt-offerings <WH5930>, and sacrificed <WH2076> peace-offerings <WH8002> of <WH2077> oxen <WH6499> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.
And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> half <WH2677> of the blood <WH1818>, and put <WH7760> it in basins <WH101>; and half <WH2677> of the blood <WH1818> he sprinkled <WH2236> on the altar <WH4196>.

And he took <WH3947> the book <WH5612> of the covenant <WH1285>, and read <WH7121> in the audience <WH241> of the people <WH5971>: and they said <WH559>, All that Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> will we do <WH6213>, and be obedient <WH8085>.

And Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> the blood <WH1818>, and sprinkled <WH2236> it on the people <WH5971>, and said <WH559>, Behold the blood <WH1818> of the covenant <WH1285>, which Jehovah <WH3068> hath made <WH3772> with you concerning all these words <WH1697>.
Then went up <WH5927> Moses <WH4872>, and Aaron <WH175>, Nadab <WH5070>, and Abihu <WH30>, and seventy <WH7657> of the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>:

and they saw <WH7200> the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; and there was under his feet <WH7272> as it were a paved <WH3840> work <WH4639> of sapphire stone <WH5601>, and as it were the very <WH6106> heaven <WH8064> for clearness <WH2892>.
And upon the nobles <WH678> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> he laid <WH7971> not his hand <WH3027>: and they beheld <WH2372> God <WH430>, and did eat <WH398> and drink <WH8354>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Come up <WH5927> to me into the mount <WH2022>, and be there <WH5414>: and I will give thee the tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68>, and the law <WH8451> and the commandment <WH4687>, which I have written <WH3789>, that thou mayest teach them <WH3384>.
And Moses <WH4872> rose up <WH6965>, and Joshua <WH3091> his minister <WH8334>: and Moses <WH4872> went up <WH5927> into the mount <WH2022> of God <WH430>.

And he said <WH559> unto the elders <WH2205>, Tarry <WH3427> ye here <WH2088> for us <WH7725>, until we come again unto you <WH175>: and, behold, Aaron and Hur <WH2354> are with you <WH4310>; whosoever hath <WH1167> a cause <WH1697>, let <WH1167> him come near unto them <WH5066>.
And Moses <WH4872> went up <WH5927> into the mount <WH2022>, and the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> the mount <WH2022>.

And the glory <WH3519> of Jehovah <WH3068> abode <WH7931> upon mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, and the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> it six <WH8337> days <WH3117>: and the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> he called <WH7121> unto Moses <WH4872> out of the midst <WH8432> of the cloud <WH6051>.

And the appearance <WH4758> of the glory <WH3519> of Jehovah <WH3068> was like devouring <WH398> fire <WH784> on the top <WH7218> of the mount <WH2022> in the eyes <WH5869> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And Moses <WH4872> entered <WH935> into the midst <WH8432> of the cloud <WH6051>, and went up <WH5927> into the mount <WH2022>: and Moses <WH4872> was in the mount <WH2022> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>.
